attributes.action: Introduce registration documents and road fund licence for all pedal cycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They use the roads (and frequently the footpaths), they should contribute to their upkeep. 
Registration would provide a means of identify the lycra-clad "hit and run" cycling hooligans who terrorise old people and small children on the pavements of all of Britain's major towns and cities.
